_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: CS2D Linux
author: support@rodion-network.net

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Installation Script

apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates unzip wget
mkdir -p /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server/
#Latest CS2D
wget https://rodion-network.net/cs2d.zip
unzip cs2d.zip
chmod 777 cs2d_dedicated
rm cs2d.zip

chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server

variables.name: Map
variables.description: The default map for the server.
